pull.title: refactor: Simply include CTxMemPool::Options in CTxMemPool directly rather than duplicating definition
pull.body: Instead of duplicating mempool options two places, just include the Options struct directly on the CTxMemPool

events.body:

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29954](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29954) (RPC: Return `permitbaremultisig` and `maxdatacarriersize` in `getmempoolinfo` by kristapsk)
* [#29942](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29942) (Remove redundant `-datacarrier` option by vostrnad)
* [#29680](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29680) (wallet: fix unrelated parent conflict doesn't cause child tx to be marked as conflict by Eunovo)
* [#29520](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29520) (add `-limitdummyscriptdatasize` option by Retropex)
* [#29325](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29325) (consensus: Store transaction nVersion as uint32_t by achow101)
* [#29309](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29309) (Add a `-permitbarepubkey` option by vostrnad)
* [#29060](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29060) (Policy: Report reason inputs are non standard by ismaelsadeeq)
* [#28984](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28984) (Cluster size 2 package rbf by instagibbs)
* [#28830](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28830) ([refactor] Check CTxMemPool options in ctor by TheCharlatan)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
Looking at the conflicts with kernel, v3, cluster mempool, etc., is this the kind of mempool refactor we should defer for now?
Closing for now due to inactivity. Leave a comment below to have it re-opened.

events.message: refactor: Simply include CTxMemPool::Options in CTxMemPool directly rather than duplicating definition
